argTypes.modelValue: Array of selected checkbox values in group
argTypes.disabled: Disables all checkboxes in group, making them unavailable for interaction
argTypes.size: Size of all checkboxes in group: sm (small), normal (default), lg (large)
argTypes.variant: Style variant of all checkboxes in group: outlined (with border) or filled (filled)
argTypes.name: Name attribute for all checkboxes in group (used for grouping in forms)
argTypes.default: Slot for placing child CCheckbox components
argTypes.updatemodelValue: Event for updating array of selected values
argTypes.change: Event fired when selected values in group change
